resources.string:
Hi, my name is Csaba Nagy! 

To be a programmer was a childhood dream, but did not have the right 
oppurtunities in that time. But in the end of last year, I started to dig myself in the 
developer role and I ended up in a course made by the Progmatic Coding Academy. 
As I got deeper and deeper I realised I enjoy it more and more every day. 
I dropped in to a very fascinating universe.

On the course the main programming language was Java. Later on we also learned HTML, 
CSS and SQL (MySQL, PostGresql). In our project work we used the Scrum Metodology and 
Git Version Control. In the last part I decided to go for the backend specialisation, 
so I had the luck to get know of the Bootstrap and Spring framework combined with REST API. 
Other technologies I worked with: JPA, Thymeleaf, Oauth, Maven, Bootstrap, 
Dozer and Postman. I spent my free time to get some knowledge about other languages 
like JavaScript, C#, Kotlin and Swift.
